description: The RES_DB_MAIN is the primary table for storing results data.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record.

columns.name: RES_VAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The validation status category number for the result.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


In Progress


Resulted


Preliminary


Verified


Cancel


Don't Test


Deleted


Pending Preliminary Verification


Pending Final Verification


Corrected


Cosign

columns.name: RES_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the specimen that is associated with the result record.

columns.name: RES_SPEC_NO_REL
columns.description: The related external specimen ID number for the given result. It gets the specimen ID through related externa ID number (I OVR 10026), which in turn uses the specimen related external ID number (I OVS 26) for the first specimen associated with the result.

columns.name: RES_EPT_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient (EPT) associated with the result record.

columns.name: RES_GW_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record for a general workcard associated with this result record.

columns.name: RES_OW_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the organism workcard result record associated with this result record.

columns.name: RES_ABNORMAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The abnormal level category number for the result.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal

columns.name: RES_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The order ID associated with the result's test. It gets the order ID through the related external ID number (I OVR 10026) , which in turn uses order ID (I OVS 85) for the first specimen associated with the result.

columns.name: RES_TEST_MTHD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the test method.

columns.name: RES_TEST_MTHD_ID_METHOD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the instrument interface, method, method grouper, or middle tier interface record.

columns.name: RES_VERIFY_LAB_ID
columns.description: Lab where result was verified

columns.name: RES_RQG_PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the non-participating submitter's patient (RQG) associated with the result record.

columns.name: CURRENT_ACTION_ID
columns.description: The action which is currently in progress for the workcard.

columns.name: CURRENT_ACTION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the node record.

columns.name: SLIDE_REVIEW_RPT_YN
columns.description:
Setting for a hematology test to determine if the Slide Review part of the test is reported out or not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DIFF_REPORTED_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of differential reported category number for the result.    Note: this item is used for CBC test only.   Also note: unlike DIFF_TYPE_RPTD_C, this item is not set only during result transmittal and so may be set when DIFF_TYPE_RPTD_C is not.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Auto


Manual


None

columns.name: DIFF_CELL_COUNT_EVT
columns.description: Stores the number of cells to count before which an action will be triggered. This value is used when a manual cell count is being performed such as a CBC Differential.

columns.name: MAIN_RPTD_YN
columns.description:
Setting for a hematology test to determine if the main part of the test is loaded and reported out.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SLIDE_REVIEW_RPT_YN

columns.name: CAT_INI
columns.description: Stores the master file from which to select a category list for multiline component level category comments.

columns.name: CAT_ITEM
columns.description: Stores the item from which to select a category list for multiline component level category comments.

columns.name: TEST_LINE
columns.description: The test line number for the information associated with the specimen of this result. Along with RES_SPECIMEN_ID, this forms the foreign key to the SPEC_TEST_REL table.

columns.name: DIFF_TYPE_RPTD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of differential reported category number for the result.   Note: this item is used for CBC test only. Since this item is set only during result transmittal, it is not set for Quality Control (QC) results. Lastly, only the main result will have this item set.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: DIFF_REPORTED_C_NAME

columns.name: COSIGN_MAJOR_EDT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if a cosigned version of the result has been modified with a major edit.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SLIDE_REVIEW_RPT_YN

columns.name: LINKED_CBC_TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the hemogram/auto diff test linked to a manual diff test. If there is no linked test, the unique ID of the manual diff test is stored.

columns.name: RAND_REFX_FIRED_YN
columns.description:
Tracks if the random rescreen reflex extension was fired for this result


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SLIDE_REVIEW_RPT_YN

columns.name: REQ_COSIGNER_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique ID of the user record requested to cosign this result. If blank, any user can cosign this result.

columns.name: VALIDATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the result was validated.

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_CONTAINER_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the container type of the specimen for this result.

columns.name: SPEC_TYPE_CONTAINER_TYPE_ID_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the container type record.

columns.name: VAR_UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the variant associated with this result was added, updated, or deleted.
